0001_needleburst_cactus.description: A towering cactus emerges from the ground, expelling its needles in devastating bursts.
0001_needleburst_cactus.name: Needleburst Cactus

0002_black_hand.description: The black handâ€™s grasp wilts flesh and mars the soul.
0002_black_hand.name: Black Hand

0005_red_mist_frenzy.description: Like sharks reacting to blood in the water, creatures affected by the red mist become frenzied beasts.
0005_red_mist_frenzy.name: Red Mist Frenzy

0006_vengeful_spirit.description: You conjure a vengeful manifestation of an unconscious ally, allowing their player to still play a part in battle.
0006_vengeful_spirit.name: Vengeful Spirit

0007_deconstruct.description: Disassemble mundane objects into their smallest mechanical components.
0007_deconstruct.name: Deconstruct

0009_void_shield.description: An iridescent gossamer veil surrounds you, absorbing energy and dissipating it into the void between the planes.
0009_void_shield.name: Void Shield

0010_harrowshriek.description: The high-pitched shriek of a chiropteran beast, damaging, deafening and frightening your prey.
0010_harrowshriek.name: Harrowshriek

0013_deathrite_shroud.description: Summon a cursed shroud that silences a creature and slowly tears at its physical body.
0013_deathrite_shroud.name: Deathrite Shroud

0014_summon_megalith.description: You summon an ancient monolith, damaging enemies and granting strength to your allies.
0014_summon_megalith.name: Summon Megalith

0016_keep_moving.description: Order a creature to keep moving, running past you.
0016_keep_moving.name: Keep Moving

0017_waynes_tag_team.description: Designate a tag team partner to increase both your and your partners offense.
0017_waynes_tag_team.name: Waynes Tag Team

0018_fist.description: A simple punch empowered with musclemancy.
0018_fist.name: Fist

0020_destabilize.description: You target the bonds holding an object or creature together, weakening its structural and metaphysical integrity.
0020_destabilize.name: Destabilize

0008_ash_rain.description: Create a sullen downpour of hot ash end burning embers.
0008_ash_rain.name: Ash Rain

0011_grim_harvest.description: Reap nearby creatures' life force and claim it as your own.
0011_grim_harvest.name: Reaper's Share

0012_glacial_prison.description: Imprison a creature in ice, draining any warmth from it over time.
0012_glacial_prison.name: Glacial Prison

0015_stormflight.description: Bestow the gift of lightning-infused flight.
0015_stormflight.name: Stormflight

0019_mist_phantoms.description: Icy mist takes up the shapes of three murderous phantoms, shrouding your presence and hunting down your enemies.
0019_mist_phantoms.name: Mist Phantoms

0004_anchor_of_tragedy.description: A distant shipâ€™s bell sounds, ethereal chains rattle and a black iron anchor appears to drag its target to the depths of the sea.
0004_anchor_of_tragedy.name: Anchor of Tragedy

0000_srd_guidance.description: Grant a small boost to an ally's next ability check.
0000_srd_guidance.name: Guidance

0000_srd_message.description: Whisper a message over a great distance.
0000_srd_message.name: Message

0021_grove_moss.description: Moss exudes a calming earthy smell and is as soft as a feather bed, giving off warmth when it is cold or having a gentle cooling effect when it is hot.
0021_grove_moss.name: Grove Moss

0022_brittlebone_hex.description: Weaken the curse victim's bones until they crumble unter the slightest pressure.
0022_brittlebone_hex.name: Brittlebone Hex

0023_soothing_scents.description: You exude a pleasent smell, granting nearby allies reprieve from their ailments.
0023_soothing_scents.name: Soothing Scents

0000_srd_prestidigitation.description: Create a number of useful minor magical effects.
0000_srd_prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation

0024_rats.description: To lessen an attack's impact, you turn into a swam of rats, absorbing the hit and skitter-scuttling to safety.
0024_rats.name: Rats!

0025_magma_prison.description: Imprisoned within a magma sphere's molten core, a creature will suffer horrendous amounts of fire damage over time, its body possibly being destroyed by the magma.
0025_magma_prison.name: Magma Prison

0026_detonate.description: You blow up a non-magical object, causing it to violently rip apart and damage surrounding creatures.
0026_detonate.name: Detonate

0027_gunpowder_cloud.description: You create an obscuring cloud of swirling gunpowder that violently explodes when ignited.
0027_gunpowder_cloud.name: Gunpowder Cloud

0028_arcane_bombardment.description: You call in an arcane bombardment, causing area damage over a randomized number of turns.
0028_arcane_bombardment.name: Prescient Bombardment

0029_inner_heat.description: Purge your body from cold and poison and unleash your inner fire against your enemies.
0029_inner_heat.name: Inner Heat

0031_gravegraspers.description: Undead hands claw at an enemy, choking the life from it and slowing it down.
0031_gravegraspers.name: Gravegraspers

0030_scarab_infestation.description: You summon a swarm of scarabs, feeding on your enemies' life force and healing your allies in turn.
0030_scarab_infestation.name: Scarab Infestation

0032_profane_parrot.description: You summon the spiritual apparition of a potty mouthed parrot to circle above you, hurling insults at your opponents.
0032_profane_parrot.name: Profane Parrot

0033_bullet_dew.description: You shoot frozen projectiles formed from drops of water, dealing more damage when it rains.
0033_bullet_dew.name: Bullet Dew

0034_slashers_shroud.description: A misty fog surrounds you, shrouding your presence and allowing you to instantly appear anywhere within, attacking those who approach you.
0034_slashers_shroud.name: Slasher's Shroud

0035_relive.description: You enter a creature's memories to relive the last hour of its life.
0035_relive.name: Relive

0036_numerology.description: You ask a question and receive a single number an answer.
0036_numerology.name: Numerology

0037_bulwark_of_faith.description: At the cost of half your movement speed, you grant nearby allies half cover, as their faith in you provides you with temporary hit points in turn.
0037_bulwark_of_faith.name: Bulwark Of Faith

0038_grand_entrance.description: Your magnificent presence upon entering combat provides temporary hit points to your allies and weakens your enemies' resolve, possibly frightening them.
0038_grand_entrance.name: Grand Entrance

0039_stormsong.description: Your words carry the power of the storm, empowering a creature's movement with the speed of lightning and its attacks with the fury of thunder.
0039_stormsong.name: Stormsong

0040_ripple.description: You recognize a ripple in the fabric of causality and immediately act to influence it in your favor.
0040_ripple.name: Ripple

0041_terrorbolt.description: Harrowing energies condensend into lightning, frightening both the target creature and surrounding beings.
0041_terrorbolt.name: Terrorbolt

0042_thought_rot.description: Poison a creature's thoughts and possibly break concentration, the higher the target's Intelligence score, the more damage you do.
0042_thought_rot.name: Thought Rot

0043_black_tears.description: Deal damage to a creature and curse it to take more damage when it fails a saving throw or attack roll.
0043_black_tears.name: Black Tears

0048_predatory_focus.description: As your focus sharpens, vulnerable prey is highlighted to you, allowing you to cull the herd with an exceptionally placed shot.
0048_predatory_focus.name: Predatory Focus

0044_retrace.description: Perfectly retrace the steps a creature took within the last 1 hour.
0044_retrace.name: RETRACE

0045_stumbleground.description: Disturb the ground under an approaching creature, possibly knocking it prone and crushing it under its own weight.
0045_stumbleground.name: Stumbleground

0046_fist_of_iron.description: Transform your arm into solid steel for a powerful strike and increased defense against the next attack.
0046_fist_of_iron.name: Fist Of Iron

0047_subtle_lure.description: A subtle spell that compels chosen creatures to investigate a captivating stimulus, without raising alarm.
0047_subtle_lure.name: Subtle Lure

0049_allconsuming_flame.description: You create a roaring blaze of fire that continunally grows in size and intensity.
0049_allconsuming_flame.name: All-Consuming Flame

0050_evoke_grandeur.description: You let an object appear as if it were an equivalent object worth ten times its original value.
0050_evoke_grandeur.name: Evoke Grandeur

0051_predatory_adaption.description: You forcefully use a nearby creature's statistics to make a saving throw.
0051_predatory_adaption.name: Predatory Adaptation

0052_sense_mood.description: You briefly sense the the emotional states of creatures surrounding you.
0052_sense_mood.name: Sense Mood

0000_paladin_pack_1_bladevow.description: Vow to make a number of attacks, each one increasing your chance to hit, but forcing you to only attack and possibly meditate on your failings if do not uphold your vow.
0000_paladin_pack_1_bladevow.name: Bladevow

0000_paladin_pack_1_blessed_battleground.description: This sanctified space grants magical potency to non-magical weapon attacks against fiends and undead, weakening their vitality and hindering their ability to resist death.
0000_paladin_pack_1_blessed_battleground.name: Blessed Battlegrounds

0000_paladin_pack_1_bloodrain.description: Sacrifice your own life force to either deal damage or heal creatures within an area, at the cost of reducing your maximum hit points until you rest.
0000_paladin_pack_1_bloodrain.name: Bloodrain

0000_paladin_pack_1_cavalcade.description: This spell summons spectral mounts for you and your allies,  granting a bonus move and attack, when beginning combat in formation.
0000_paladin_pack_1_cavalcade.name: Cavalcade

0000_paladin_pack_1_chalice_of_charity.description: Fill a chalice with healing nectar from your lay on hands pool, which can be consumed to regain hit points by drinking or pouring into another creature's mouth.
0000_paladin_pack_1_chalice_of_charity.name: Chalice Of Charity

0000_paladin_pack_1_death_oath.description: You return to consciousness with 1 hit point after being reduced to 0 hit points, with the condition that you must confront the creature responsible, up to three times.
0000_paladin_pack_1_death_oath.name: Death Oath

0000_paladin_pack_1_ironclad.description: Once you've ritually bound a suit of armor to you, you can instantly equip it using this spell, conjuring it up from thin air.
0000_paladin_pack_1_ironclad.name: Ironclad

0000_paladin_pack_1_onwards.description: Using a reaction triggered by your war cry, allies within range can move freely and swiftly towards you, unaffected by obstacles or attacks of opportunity.
0000_paladin_pack_1_onwards.name: Onwards

0000_paladin_pack_1_raise_banner.description: Plant your banner, allowing your allies to benefit from your Aura of Protection while within range.
0000_paladin_pack_1_raise_banner.name: Raise Banner

0000_paladin_pack_1_shieldwall.description: Become part of a spectral shield wall, bolstering your defenses and providing cover for allies while blocking and dealing radiant damage to nearby enemies.
0000_paladin_pack_1_shieldwall.name: Shieldwall

0053_curse_of_corrosion.description: You a creature's very essence, dealing acid damage and possibly reducing its AC.
0053_curse_of_corrosion.name: Curse Of Corrosion

0054_spoils_of_the_hunt.description: You are imbued with the strength of a slain creature, gaining, among other things, additional hit points, damage resistances or immunities.
0054_spoils_of_the_hunt.name: Spoils of the Hunt

0056_out_of_place.description: You attune to the essence of the target area, gaining insights into its general aura, anomalies, and recent contrasting presences.
0056_out_of_place.name: Out Of Place

0055_morrowgleam_crown.description: A crown of radiant light that grants damage resistances, blinds attackers and banishes darkness.
0055_morrowgleam_crown.name: Morrowgleam Crown

0003_spiteful_harpoon.description: You summon a rusted harpoon with a barbed tip, dealing more damage the bigger the target is.
0003_spiteful_harpoon.name: Spiteful Harpoon

0022_shadow_symphony.description: You weave an auditory illusion allowing allies to hide in plain sight.
0022_shadow_symphony.name: Shadow Symphony

0057_crystal_carapace.description: You grow crystal scales that protect you from damage and might hurt attackers.
0057_crystal_carapace.name: Crystal Carapace

0058_steal_heat.description: Absorb a creature's heat and unleash it against your foes.
0058_steal_heat.name: Steal Heat

0059_festering_truth.description: You predict a creature's immediate future, weakening it if your prediction comes to pass.
0059_festering_truth.name: Festering Truth

0060_illusionary_labyrinth.description: You create a phantasmal maze of shifting, illusory walls that traps and disorients creatures, causing them to move in random directions and take psychic damage.
0060_illusionary_labyrinth.name: Illusionary Labyrinth

0061_flame_dance.description: This spell doubles your jump distance and deals fire damage to nearby creatures when you land.
0061_flame_dance.name: Flame Dance

0062_flashfreeze.description: This spell blasts an area with freezing cold, damaging creatures and either reducing their movement speed to 0 or at least by half.
0062_flashfreeze.name: Flashfreeze

0063_burning_zeal.description: This spell manifests your beliefs, magnifying your force of personality to boost social skills and buff your saving throws.
0063_burning_zeal.name: Burning Zeal

0064_hope_devourer.description: A spell that curses a creature, hindering and weakening it, while healing the caster each time their target fails a roll.
0064_hope_devourer.name: Hope Devourer

0065_lifeleech_protocol.description: A devious protective spell that drains nearby creatures' life force to heal the caster when they fall.
0065_lifeleech_protocol.name: Lifeleech Protocol

0066_mutual_suffering.description: A spell that mirrors damage or afflictions suffered by an ally within another nearby target.
0066_mutual_suffering.name: Mutual Suffering

0067_twilight_pathways.description: A spell travel that allows for a fast, albeit risky journey through a shade world to a known landmark.
0067_twilight_pathways.name: Twilight Pathways

0068_from_dust.description: Removing your heart for safekeeping, you gain a new body upon death for your soul to inhabit, reviving you.
0068_from_dust.name: From Dust

0069_duty_calls.description: You puppeteer a dead or unconscious creature, forcing it to make a single attack against a target of your choice.
0069_duty_calls.name: Duty Calls

0070_rekindle.description: You imbue a creature with life-giving flame, causing it to return to life after being killed.
0070_rekindle.name: Rekindle

0071_broadside_from_beyond.description: A spectral warship at full sail appears on the horizon and unleashes a barrage upon the battlefield.
0071_broadside_from_beyond.name: Broadside from Beyond

0072_campfire_tales.description: Enchant a campfire to visualise the stories told around.
0072_campfire_tales.name: Campfire Tales

0073_constructed_consciousness.description: Simulate a creatureâ€™s personality to practice interrogations, explore memories, plan strategies, or seek emotional insight, making it useful for roleplay, storytelling, or personal reflection..
0073_constructed_consciousness.name: Constructed Consciousness

0074_nightly_vigil.description: Summon a vigilant spectre, alerting you to enemies and giving you an edge in case of a nightly ambush.
0074_nightly_vigil.name: Nightly Vigil

0075_dying_breath.description: Suffocate a creature while regaining life yourself.
0075_dying_breath.name: Dying Breath

0077_phantom_passenger.description: Possess a creature to have it unknowingly carry you with it.
0077_phantom_passenger.name: Phantom Passenger

0078_oathbound_charge.description: Summon a ghostly knight to charge head-on into your enemies.
0078_oathbound_charge.name: Oathbound Charge

0079_raise_wall.description: Raise a single wall panel to block off parts of the battlefield or crush your enemies with it.
0079_raise_wall.name: Raise Wall

0080_nightfall.description: Blot out the sun to strengthen creatures of the dark and weaken the light.
0080_nightfall.name: Nightfall

0081_haunt.description: Become a ghostly apparition to travel through walls, hide your presence and frighten enemies.
0081_haunt.name: Haunt

0082_oathbound_rout.description: Conjure a spectral knight, chasing down your enemies and smiting them with increasingly powerful attacks.
0082_oathbound_rout.name: Oathbound Rout

0083_elemental_echo.description: Evoke elemental energy to damage a creature, shrouding your weapon into an elemental echo to deal more damage on its next hit.
0083_elemental_echo.name: Elemental Echo

0085_chosen_thrall.description: You elevate an undead you control to act as your lieutenant.
0085_chosen_thrall.name: Chosen Thrall

0086_pestilence.description: Infect a creature with a disease that can spread to other creatures, damaging them over time.
0086_pestilence.name: Pestilence

0087_cloudwalk.description: Conjure hovering, traversable clouds that vanish after stepping on them.
0087_cloudwalk.name: Cloudwalk

0084_hold_heretic.description: Bind a creature in red-hot chains, restraining it and dealing continuous fire damage.
0084_hold_heretic.name: Hold Heretic

0088_glimpse.description: You glimpse possible outcomes, allowing to take two reactions during the next round, including one that grants you advantage on a saving throw.
0088_glimpse.name: Glimpse

0089_nebula_gate.description: You conjure two swirling nebula portals that let you and your allies allies slip instantly from one to the other.
0089_nebula_gate.name: Nebula Gate

0090_timestamp.description: You tether yourself to a moment in time, ready to snap back to that precise point.
0090_timestamp.name: Timestamp

0091_vanish.description: React to the outbreak of combat by turning invisible and possibly moving out of harms way.
0091_vanish.name: Vanish

0093_moth_wings.description: Fly a medium distance and possibly put a nearby creature to sleep.
0093_moth_wings.name: Moth Wings

0094_curse_mark.description: Mark a target with a sigil that can be targeted seperately and deals additional damage when hit.
0094_curse_mark.name: Curse Mark

0094_sinister_seedling.description: Infest a creature with a magical seed to drain its health over time.
0094_sinister_seedling.name: Sinister Seedling

0095_skitterspotters.description: Summon a swarm of rats that marks a creature for a deadly shot.
0095_skitterspotters.name: Skitter-Spotters

classes: bard, druid, ranger, sorcerer, warlock, wizard

0096_atrament.description: Once per creature, deal damage and absorb its lifeforce.
0096_atrament.name: Atrament

classes: bard, cleric, druid, paladin, sorcerer, warlock, wizard

0097_honour_the_deed.description: When an ally performs a heroic act, you reward it with the ability to perform a Great Deed.
0097_honour_the_deed.name: Honour the Deed

0098_blade_of_burning_blood.description: Ignite the blood coating your blade to deal additional fire damage on your next attack.
0098_blade_of_burning_blood.name: Blade of Burning Blood

classes: bard, cleric, druid, paladin, ranger, sorcerer, warlock, wizard

0000_paladin_pack_1_shoulder_the_burden.description: Make Death Saving throws to prevent nearby allies from falling unconscious.
0000_paladin_pack_1_shoulder_the_burden.name: Shoulder the Burden

0099_crowfathers_kin.description: A murder of crows hacks at your enmies, blinds them and protects you.
0099_crowfathers_kin.name: Crowfather's Kin

0100_stormspear.description: Massive lighting and thunder damage against various targets.
0100_stormspear.name: Stormspear

0101_supercell.description: A chance to strike an enemy each turn, increasing damage until discharge and reset.
0101_supercell.name: Supercell

0102_elemental_blessing.description: Add an elemental burst to an ally's weapon as they attack.
0102_elemental_blessing.name: Elemental Blessing
